    Christian Trimble, Devon Tackett, Josh Kennedy

      • convert

        public static java.lang.Object convert(java.lang.Object value,
                       java.lang.Class type)

        A conversion utility that will properly convert enumeration types. All other conversion are done with org.apache.commons.beanutils.ConvertUtils.convert( Object, Class ).

        Parameters:
        value - the value to convert.
        type - the target type for the value.
        Returns:
        the converted type.
